Subseries II C: Ceramic Pig Figurines with Human-Like Traits
Subseries II C: Ceramic Pig Figurines with Human-Like Traits

This subseries contains multiple pig figurines or sets of pig figurines that are made entirely or predominantly of ceramic material. The figurines are engaged in some sort of human-like activity or display human-like behavior.
